_siteProcess.title: Materials
_siteProcess.text: Before the design phase could begin, I had to gather the necessary materials for the project. Those materials being: Images, Colors/Theme, Fonts, Text.

_siteProcess.title: Design
_siteProcess.text: After accquiring the materials, I used Adobe XD to build a website layout and based used this as a guide on how the website will look after completion.

_siteProcess.title: Setup
_siteProcess.text: To make the project a bit simpler, I went ahead and setup a VS Code enviroment to create a developer friendly experience and in thus creating a higher quality project.

_siteProcess.title: Building
_siteProcess.text: With this step taking the longest, I wanted to make sure that the quality of the project was always a priority. Using my 5+ years of experience, I experimented and used ethical practices to construct the project.

_siteProcess.title: Result
_siteProcess.text: As the final step, I will send an invoice or request a check to be sent to my home. Once that is done, the project will be sent up to a production server for the world to see.
